title: Honeyfruit & Malz Passive

replies.body:
Malzahar's passive pops whenever *any* crowd control hits him (or takes damage). 

The honeyfruit explicitly applies slow as to make it *not* overpowered.

Probably. They just changed it so honeyfruit no longer counts as "in%%%%bat". So that prob another thing they will look at changing too.

edit: LMAO what stupid person made c-o-m a bad phrase?
